answers.answer: some antibiotics are ok. tylenol is ok too, you xan see your dentist as well just let them know your pregnant
You need to see your dentist

i was just reading up on the same thing looks like the only thing we can take is tylenol ... There is a list of NO's Aspirin, acetametaphin, naproxan, advil, motrin im guessing anything with aspirin in it , also it can lead to gesstational diabetes and no codeine either

Hi Natalie, I was crying with toothache last week and thought I would have to get it out! Best advice is to scrub it with a good toothpaste at least 3 times a day and also a good mouthwash. Your gums might be sore but scrub anyway every single time you eat.  3 days later my teeth are perfect + lovely and white to boot :-D I know it sounds too easy but trust me it may work. I too am 27 weeks but I think it is a symptom of pregnancy to get teeth problems. Try it x

question: I am 27 weeks pregnant and have a horrible toothache what can I do or take for it? And are antibiotics okay?
title: toothache
